name: <cpu::local::dyn_cpu_local::DynamicStorage<T> as cpu::local::AnyStorage<T>>::get_mut_ptr_on_target

cpu::local::AnyStorage::get_ptr_on_targe.doc: Gets the `const` pointer for the object on a target CPU.

core::ptr::const_ptr::<impl *const T>::c.doc:
Changes constness without changing the type.

 This is a bit safer than `as` because it wouldn't silently change the type if the code is
 refactored.
